entry.title: [GRA][WebPaaS] - Infrastructure Maintenance
entry.content:
Apr 26, 03:40 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 26, 03:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 24, 17:08 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our "Web PaaS" offer.

Start time : 26/04/2024 03:00 UTC
End time : 26/04/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.

Thank you for your understanding.
